meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the period following the Middle Ages.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed postmedieval artifacts from the Renaissance era.
meanings.sent2: The postmedieval architecture of the cathedral showcased intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The postmedieval knight tried to joust with a modern car, mistaking it for a dragon.
meanings.sent4: Her fashion sense was postmedieval, blending medieval styles with a contemporary twist.
meanings.sent5: The postmedieval tapestry depicted scenes of daily life in vivid colors.

meanings.definition: Occurring or existing after the medieval period.
meanings.sent1: The postmedieval manuscripts were written in a more modern script.
meanings.sent2: In the postmedieval era, new technologies revolutionized daily life.
meanings.sent3: The postmedieval banquet featured medieval dishes with a modern twist.
meanings.sent4: His postmedieval thinking was ahead of its time, blending old wisdom with new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The postmedieval city skyline contrasted ancient towers with sleek skyscrapers.
